description.text: After one year at West Pier Studio, I switched over to the Unity team from the Unreal Engine project (High Up). Initially, my focus shifted towards updating the Unity version from 2019 to 2022, (which changed a lot of things on the WebGL stack, as replacing the WebGL Unity loader). In this capacity, my primary responsibility was fixing the WebGL templates across all 3 applications: Deck, Pergola, and Fence. Fortunately, the company used 'Webpack' for efficient bundling, expediting the testing process. This task involved the use of languages such as JavaScript, HTML, and C#..
Subsequently, I worked on a series of bugs to gain confidence with the codebase and gradually began undertaking tasks involving the implementation of new features.
Throughout this period, I have gained experience in:

items: Adherence to coding standards and design patterns.
Backend development encompassing APIs, databases, and related technologies.
